title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
**Introducing Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags: Your Ultimate Kitchen Companion!**

Say goodbye to messy kitchen clean-ups and hello to seamless, stress-free trash disposal with the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. Designed with your convenience in mind, these 13-gallon bags are perfect for everyday use, providing the perfect blend of durability and reliability.

**Key Features:**
- **Flex-tra Strength:** Engineered to resist tears and punctures, ensuring your trash stays contained and your kitchen remains clean.
- **13 Gallon Capacity:** Spacious enough to handle all your kitchen waste, from food scraps to packaging, without the need for frequent bag changes.
- **Red Drawstring Closure:** A stylish and functional feature that makes tying and disposing of the bag easy and mess-free. The red drawstring stands out, adding a touch of color to your kitchen.
- **Unscented:** Ideal for those sensitive to fragrances, these bags are unscented, ensuring they don’t interfere with the fresh, clean scent of your kitchen.
- **Tear-Resistant White Plastic:** Crafted from high-quality, tear-resistant white plastic, these bags are strong enough to handle the toughest kitchen tasks.
- **50 Count:** Each pack comes with 50 bags, providing you with a generous supply to keep your kitchen running smoothly for weeks.

**Alexa Voice Shopping Compatible:**
Easily reorder these versatile trash bags using your Alexa-enabled device. Just say, "Alexa, reorder Amazon Basics Flextra Trash Bags," and they’ll be on their way to your doorstep.

**Why Choose Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags?**
- **Reliability:** Trust in the quality and performance of Amazon Basics products.
- **Convenience:** The red drawstring closure and tear-resistant design make these bags a breeze to use.
- **Value:** A 50-count pack offers great value for your money, ensuring you always have the bags you need.
- **Eco-Friendly:** While durable, these bags are also designed to be part of a responsible waste management routine.

Upgrade your kitchen with the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. Order yours today and experience the difference in quality and convenience!
